Articles.Content: Has any of the master builders tried to make the FDL from Elite Dangerous or the 315P from Star Citizen?  If so, please post here, I would love to see the designs.

I tried making the Delta Glider from Orbiter before, i sort of failed. No screenshots either.

Maybe i should try again!

Edited June 9, 2017 by NSEP
i made the FDL but its really laggy so i do not have screenshots i will try soon
